name: BacteriaTestsInBronchialWashSpecimenByCultureAndIdentificationMethod
title: Bacteria (Tests in Bronchial Wash Specimen by Culture and Identification Method)
purpose: (Clinical Focus: This set of values contains codes for laboratory test names associated with detecting the presence of bacteria from a bronchial wash specimen by culture),(Data Element Scope: Laboratory tests names that were ordered or observed.),(Inclusion Criteria: Bacteria, culture, isolate, bronchial wash),(Exclusion Criteria: none)
